name: Claire Greenwood
description: A talented web developer who has a passion for UI design. Claire is not only a hardworking professional but also a loving and caring mother of two.

name: Heil Park
description: A skilled web developer with a passion for coding. Heil has a keen eye for detail and a talent for crafting complex and innovative web solutions.

name: Ciprian Oltean
description: A talented skier who spends his free time pursuing his passion for skiing. When he's not hitting the slopes, Ciprian can be found crafting innovative web solutions.

name: Valentin Manea
description: A dedicated web developer with a passion for both UI design and coding. In his free time, Valentin can be found tinkering with his 3D printer, bringing his ideas to life.
